text: Ampharete is a genus of polychaete annelid worm with a single, chevron-shaped row of teeth. == Species == Species: *Ampharete acutifrons Grube, 1860 *Ampharete agulhasensis Day, 1961 *Ampharete americana Day, 1973 *Ampharete arctica Malmgren, 1866 *Ampharete baltica Eliason, 1955 *Ampharete borealis Sars, 1856 *Ampharete brevibranchiata Treadwell, 1926 *Ampharete capensis Day, 1961 *Ampharete cirrata Webster & Benedict, 1887 *Ampharete crassiseta Annenkova, 1929 *Ampharete debrouweri Jeldes & Lefevre, 1969 *Ampharete eupalea Chamberlin, 1920 *Ampharete falcata Eliason, 1955 *Ampharete finmarchica M. Sars, 1864 *Ampharete fulcata *Ampharete gagarae Uschakov, 1950 *Ampharete goeesi Malmgren, 1866 *Ampharete goesi Malmgren, 1866 *Ampharete grubei Malmgren, 1865 *Ampharete homa Chamberlin, 1919 *Ampharete johanseni Chamberlin, 1920 *Ampharete kerguelensis McIntosh, 1885 *Ampharete kudenovi Jirkov, 1994 *Ampharete labrops Hartman, 1961 *Ampharete lindstroemi Malmgren, 1867 sensu Hessle, 1917 *Ampharete longipaleolata Uschakov, 1950 *Ampharete macrobranchia Caullery, 1944 *Ampharete minuta Langerhans, 1881 *Ampharete octocirrata Sars, 1835 *Ampharete parvidentata Day, 1973 *Ampharete petersenae Zhirkov, 1997 *Ampharete reducta Chamberlin, 1920 *Ampharete saphronovae Jirkov, 1994 *Ampharete setosa Verrill, 1873 *Ampharete sibirica Wiren, 1883 *Ampharete sombreriana McIntosh, 1885 *Ampharete trilobata Webster & Benedict, 1887 *Ampharete vega Wirén, 1883 == References == Category:Terebellida
title: Ampharete
